description:
This session introduces how to use the FastAPI framework together with Dependency Injector. It explains how dependency injection can enhance code maintainability and ease of testing through practical examples, providing valuable insights for developers interested in backend architecture design using FastAPI.

Han Barum
Hello, I am Han Barum. I focus on Python-based backend development, and I aim to share my experience using FastAPI and dependency injection patterns. My goal is to contribute to the Python ecosystem.

related_urls.label: FastAPI with Dependency Injector - PyCon Korea 2024 Session Introduction

title: FastAPI with Dependency Injector - Han Barum [PyCon.KR 2024]
